name: 洪克銘
objective:
本課程將介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，以及供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之烯烴與芳香烴工業等相關技術。並將介紹我國石化工業、討論新開發之頁岩油氣開採對煉油與石化工業之影響，以及面對國際競爭態勢下之石化高值化之產業轉型問題。隨著環保意識高漲與氣候變遷議題引起之關注，石油工業發展所面臨，環保、節能減碳、資源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰也是本課程討論之目標。
Topics covered: 1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture. 2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemicals  3. Petrochemicals and its application 4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 5. Carbon reduction, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel 6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry
schedule:
Course Syllabus
1. Introduction : Petroleum Refining & Petrochemical Industries 煉油與石化工業簡介  (1st week)
2. Basic principles for Petroleum Refining 石油產品與煉製原理  (2nd~3rd weeks)
3. Refining Technologies：Fractionation、Hydrofining、Reforming、 FCC 、 RFCC、RDS and relates Processes 煉製技術  (4th~7th weeks).
5. Group Discussion (I) & Midterm 專題討論及期中測驗  (8th~9th weeks) 
6. Naphtha Cracking & Petrochemicals 輕油裂解與石化工業  (10th~12th weeks)
7. Shale Gas & Its impact to Refining & Petrochemical Industries 頁岩油氣對煉油與石化之衝擊  (13th week)
8. Carbon reduction、Energy Conservation & sustainability Issue 減碳、節能與永續之議題  (14th~15th week)
9. Group Discussion (II) 專題討論(二)  (16th~17th weeks)
10.Final Exam 期末測驗  (18th week)
scorePolicy:
出席與學習態度 20%
Presentation & Report  40%
Final Exam  40%
